channel.title: Rareity Drops edit? Ruse 317
channel.description: Hey guys, I'm trying to make the Ruse source different from the other Ruse leeches.. Changed name, client background, and all. Trying to make it not a full on leech, trying to add more bosses, etc. Anyways, in order for me to do anything, I need help finding out where I can set an item to be rare, uncommon, common, or legendary. Please help if any of you know the "Ruse Source". Thanks! :)

item.title: Rareity Drops edit? Ruse 317
item.dc:creator: @skiller8860 skiller8860
item.description:
@skiller8860 wrote:

Hey guys, I’m trying to make the Ruse source different from the other Ruse leeches… Changed name, client background, and all. Trying to make it not a full on leech, trying to add more bosses, etc. Anyways, in order for me to do anything, I need help finding out where I can set an item to be rare, uncommon, common, or legendary.
